attributes.action: make the police and judiciary enforce existing law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police and judicial system are failing,and are a disgrace, they are not fit for purpose.we have adequate laws, they simply need to be enforced in accordance with the statutory purpose of the Police, to protect life and property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
